Services

These are our Services

Private practice marketing

Referrals to specialists over the past decade have nearly doubled. The question is, are you getting those referrals? With the ever changing environment of healthcare, it is becoming more challenging to remain competitive in private practice. Research proves that physicians refer to specialists who they know and trust. Through constant contact with referring physicians, we will help drive those referrals to you. Our team uses several proven and impactful methods to increase your business and steer patient referrals to your practice. Our goal is to not only help you survive, but to thrive in an extremely complex and unstable environment. Let us help you capture more business to sustain your growth year over year.

  • Direct to physician referral marketing
  • Increase current referring physician activity
  • Establish new referral partners within the community
  • Peer to peer meetings with referral partners
  • Grand Rounds presentations at local hospitals
  • Dinner presentations highlighting your expertise
  • Create personalized bio card for marketing your practice

Exclusivity

When you decide that Thrivent is the group leading your marketing efforts and growing your market share, we guarantee that you will be the only specialist taking advantage of our expertise in your city. This gives you a huge competitive advantage as it prevents your competitors from having Thrivent’s dedicated team working to increase their business. We take pride in our relationships and will treat your practice as if it was our own.

Acute and post acute care business development

With over 14 years of sales and marketing experience within the acute care space, our team is intimately familiar with what it takes to increase revenue. We have the unique experience of not only selling to, but also for, acute and post acute facilities. We understand the obstacles you face every day in trying to increase referrals to your various specialties. Our team has personally brought in over $12 million to facilities in this space. We will replicate that success for your facility through several best practices that have been fine tuned over time. We are confident that our market knowledge coupled with our unique skill set will help you achieve the results that you desire.

  • Increased referrals through community physician outreach
  • Help establishing clinically affiliated network development
  • Identify and fix market leakage
  • Internal and external provider relationship management
  • Service gap identification within the facility as well as the community
  • Targeted growth through dedicated service line support
  • Stop competitive threats through intelligent market research

Medical patent brokering

  • Having worked for numerous medical device companies over the years, our team has formed valuable relationships in the medical technology space.
  • Do you have patents that you once thought would make you millions but are currently lying dormant? Ever wondered if you could sell your idea to industry experts?

We will shop your patented technology out to the best companies in the industry for you!
